title: One Shot: Overtime Elite
overview: One Shot: Overtime Elite follows brothers Amen and Ausar Thompson, who made NBA history as the first brothers recruited in the top five during the same draft cycle. Throughout the series, audiences will receive a behind-the-scenes peek into the brothers' pursuit of careers in professional basketball and their experiences within the Overtime Elite league, the professional basketball league for 16-20 year olds around the globe.Â
